description.value: Your connection to one element has deepened beyond mere technique into true understanding.

prerequisites.other: Sorcerous Origin trait, chosen elemental Mastery 5

system.benefits:
Choose one elemental energy (Earth, Air, Fire, Water). When you weave using that energy as primary:

  • Add your Wisdom to the damage dealt
  • You gain resistance (+2 DR) to that damage type
  • Your weaves using that energy ignore the first point of overspending penalty
